title: Paying strong for these five 1910 Obak Slogans
author: conor912

posts.post_title: Paying strong for these five 1910 Obak Slogans
posts.post_content:
I'd love to finish up this project. I know these aren't terribly rare, but I just don't have the time or desire to search all the auction sites all the time. I need the following slogans to complete my run. Looking for VG/EX-ish eye appeal, though technical grade isn't as important.... I would, however, prefer crease-free fronts.... back stamps OK....raw or slabbed. Thanks!

Delicate Aromatic
For Exacting Smokers
Instantly Popular
Mais Paper Wrapper
The Story in the Smoking
Bump. Looking to wrap up this project. Thanks for looking!
